<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Sets read-only to false for Software model and Automatically matched fields in cmdb_sam_sw_discovery_model table. Also set the reference casecade rule to clear for Softwae model.</description>
        <name>SAM - model editable and clear cascade</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function makeFieldsEditableAndClearCascade() {
	var modelGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	modelGr.addQuery('name', 'cmdb_sam_sw_discovery_model');
	modelGr.addQuery('element', 'model');
	modelGr.setValue('reference_cascade_rule', 'clear');
	modelGr.updateMultiple();

	var automatchGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	automatchGr.addQuery('name', 'cmdb_sam_sw_discovery_model');
	automatchGr.addQuery('element', 'automatched');
	automatchGr.setValue('read_only', false);
	automatchGr.updateMultiple();
}

makeFieldsEditableAndClearCascade();]]></script>
